title: vegan lasagna
instructions: first prepare the vegan ricotta cheese, soak the cashews in boiling water for 15 minutes.

drain the cashews and add them to a high powered blender along with the apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, and 2 tsp of garlic powder and blend until there are no large chunks of cashews left. If needed add some water to the blender to aid in blending
set the 'ricotta' cheese aside, and prepare the package of lasagna noodles

to prepare the meat sauce, dice the onion and add the olive oil, onion, and the rest of the garlic powder to a pan to simmer until the onions are translucent which will take approximately 7-10 minutes on medium heat
add the meat substitute to the pan and grill until the substitute is cooked thoroughly, for this recipe I prefer to use a beyond meat ground 'beef' package, or an impossible burger ground 'beef'
after the meat is cooked add the tomato paste, the tomato sauce (minus 2 tbsp)

add 2 tbsp of tomato sauce to the bottom of a loaf tin to ensure the noodles don't stick to the bottom, then layer the ingredients first layering 2-3 noodles, 1/3 of the meat sauce, and 1/3 of the ricotta cheese, optional: top with vegan cheese
bake for 20-25 minutes or until the cheese is golden
